special_text:
[+1]: Each player may draw a card. For each opponent who does, you gain 4 life.
[-3]: Exile target nonland permanent. That card’s owner may pay {2} as a sorcery to put it into their hand as long as it remains exiled.
[-8]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “Creatures you control lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1.”
